skins.shipDescription: Northampton-class Heavy Cruiser ¨C Houston, Hull Number CA-30!
skins.selfIntroduction: Hiya! I'm Houston, fifth ship of the Northampton-class! I received a Medal of Honor from the President for facing off against an entire Sakura Empire squadron in the Battle of the Java Sea and the Battle of Sunda Strait, all on my own! I'm really proud of it~!
skins.acquisition: Hiya! I'm Houston, fifth ship of the Northampton-class. I single-handedly took on Sakura Empire reinforcements in the Battle of the Sunda Strait! I hope I'll get to play with you every day from now on! Yahoo~!
skins.login: I get to play with the commander again today! Yahoo~!
skins.details: Am I a light cruiser or a heavy cruiser? You sure like to ponder over weird stuff, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, sometimes you're a little preachy, so just chill out~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I had such an exciting time in Surabaya!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Gosh, Commander... you're a real weirdo... aren't you!
